TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypeSmallDateTimeSchemaImporterExtension extends System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypesSchemaImporterExtensionHelper
Public NotInheritable Class TypeSmallDateTimeSchemaImporterExtension Inherits SqlTypesSchemaImporterExtensionHelper

summary.span: **TypeSmallDateTimeSchemaImporterExtension** 類別並非要做為獨立的元件使用，而是要做為其他類別衍生標準功能時所根據的類別。

span.span: The **TypeSmallDateTimeSchemaImporterExtension** class is not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as a class from which other classes derive standard functionality.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 **TypeSmallDateTimeSchemaImporterExtension** 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the **TypeSmallDateTimeSchemaImporterExtension** class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **TypeSmallDateTimeSchemaImporterExtension** 類別並非要做為獨立的元件使用，而是要做為其他類別衍生標準功能時所根據的類別。The **TypeSmallDateTimeSchemaImporterExtension** class is not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as a class from which other classes derive standard functionality.
